name: hatch
description: Hatch an egg to add a new BirdyPet to your aviary!

options.name: notifications

name: bug
description: Submit a bug report

description: Submit an idea

name: play
description: Play a bird game!

name: help
description: Information for all current Birdy commands
Prints out information for all current Birdy commands.

name: role
description: Choose your own role!
Change your role and/or color.
name  : The name of the role you want to use
color : Either a hex color or [one of the color names Discord provides](https://git.io/J0qzI)

options.name: name
options.description: What do you want your role name to be?

options.name: name
options.description: What do you want your role name to be?

options.name: color
options.description: The color you want to use

options.name: color
options.description: The color you want to use

name: em
description: Use animated Nitro emoji OR a mashup
Use animated Nitro emoji OR a mashup
emoji : The name of the emoji you want to use OR two emoji you want to mash together

options.name: emoji
options.description: The name of the emoji you want to use OR two emoji to mash together

name: pronouns
description: Set your preferred pronouns

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to know better

name: flickr
description: Summon a random bird pic from Flickr
Pulls a random bird picture from Flickr.
taxonomy : *Optional* An order, family, or common name to limit the results to.

options.name: taxonomy
options.description: Specify an order, family, or common name to pull from

name: bird
description: Summon a randomn bird from eBird
Pulls a random bird from eBird.
taxonomy : *Optional* An order, family, or common name to limit the results to.

options.name: taxonomy
options.description: Specify an order, family, or common name to pull from

name: fact
description: Summon a random bird fact
Pulls a random (and usually useless) bird fact.
taxonomy : *Optional* An order, family, or common name to limit the results to.

options.name: taxonomy
options.description: Specify an order, family, or common name to pull from

name: preview
description: Pull up a preview of a url that doesn't normally preview
Displays a preview of a url that doesn't normally preview (e.g., macaulaylibrary.org)
url : The URL to display a preview of.

name: submit
description: Submit to one of the Niche Bird Blogs
Submit a picture to one of the Niche Bird Blogs.
url : The url to the image. Currently supported: macaulaylibrary.org, flickr.com, and danielslim.com.
speciescode : *Optional* The species code from eBird to identify the bird in the picture for websites other than macaulaylibrary.org. If not provided, the submission will go into drafts.

name: fix
description: Fix a Niche Bird Blog post
Fix a species for a Niche Bird Blog post.
speciescode : The species code from eBird to identify the bird in the picture.

name: shuffle
description: Shuffle the queue for one of the Niche Bird Blogs
Shuffle the queue for one of the Niche Bird Blogs.

name: remove
description: Remove a photo from one of the Niche Bird Blogs
Remove a photo from one of the Niche Bird Blogs.
